personalInfo.summary: Passionate software engineer with 3+ years of experience in full-stack development. Proficient in Java, JavaScript, and modern web technologies. Strong problem-solving skills and a track record of delivering high-quality software solutions.

experience.description: Developed and maintained web applications using Java Spring Boot and React. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver features on time. Improved application performance by 40% through code optimization.
Built RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express. Implemented user authentication and authorization. Worked with MongoDB for data persistence.

projects.name: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: Built a full-stack e-commerce platform with shopping cart, payment integration, and order management.
projects.technologies: Java, Spring Boot, React, MySQL, Stripe API

projects.name: Task Management App
projects.description: Developed a collaborative task management application with real-time updates and team collaboration features.

achievements.title: Best Innovation Award
achievements.description: Received company-wide recognition for developing an innovative solution that reduced deployment time by 60%.

achievements.title: Hackathon Winner
achievements.description: First place in university hackathon for building an AI-powered study assistant application.
